name: VMware NSX Advanced Load Balancer (Avi)
description: The VMware NSX ALB Universal Orchestrator extension enables remote management and automation of cryptographic certificates within VMware NSX ALB environments through Keyfactor Command.

store_types.Name: VMware-NSX
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The URL of the NSX ALB instance, optionally prefixed with the tenant name in brackets if a specific tenant should be used, for example, [tenant-name]https://my.nsx.url/.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The type of certificate being managed, such as 'Application' for SSL offloading certificates, 'CA' for Certificate Authority certificates, or 'Controller' for controller certificates.
